properties.displayName: MCSB Baseline item DP-7 for Azure Spring Apps

features.featureName: Certificate Management in Azure Key Vault
features.featureDescription: The service supports Azure Key Vault integration for any customer certificates.
features.featureGuidance:
When enabling custom domain for apps in Azure Spring Apps, customer can store certificates in Azure Key Vault and import to Azure Spring Apps to enforce Transport Layer Security (TLS) against incoming traffic.
Please see the reference for detailed instructions.
features.customerActionsDescription: Use a secure certificate management process
